metadata.name: Adequate Descriptions
metadata.description: Realistic entries with sufficient detail from a busy teacher

formData.incident_description: Emily bumped heads with a friend while running on the Playground
formData.injury_description: Small red bump on her forehead. No cut but slight swelling. She cried for about 2 minutes but calmed down quickly.
formData.action_taken: Applied ice pack for 5 mins and gave her lots of cuddles. Sat with her in the quiet corner until she felt ready to play again
